section.name: Course Conclusion
section.summary:
Congratulations! You have reached the end of the course, Project-Based Science Instruction for Career Pathways!

To continue your learning on Project-Based Learning and Science instruction beyond the course, we encourage you to join a LINCS Community Group! Whether it is the LINCS Science Group, LINCS Teaching and Learning Group, LINCS Career Pathways and Postsecondary Transitions Group, you will find discussions, resources, and live events to further develop your teaching practices and share your expertise. Be sure to join at least one of these groups to continue your learning journey!

To complete this course, please complete the Course Evaluation below. Then, be sure to download your Certificate of Completion for this course.
